rinke

Method Detail

getComparePeriodsGrossProduct

StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsGrossProduct(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameter)
gets a data value object for key statistics concerning the gross product. It should get the following data:
  • the gross product for the specific selected payment filter
  • the gross product for all transactions
All of these items must collect the value for two periods, plus calculated the growth percentage between these periods

Returns:
a common result value object storing the data

getComparePeriodsHighestTransactionAmount

StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsHighestTransactionAmount(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameter)

getComparePeriodsMedianAmountPerTransaction

StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsMedianAmountPerTransaction(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameter)
gets a data value object for key statistics concerning the transaction amount. It should get the following data:
  • median transaction amount for the specific selected payment filter
  • the highest transaction amount for the specific selected payment filter
All of these items must collect the value for two periods, plus calculated the growth percentage between these periods

Returns:
a common result value object storing the data

getComparePeriodsNumberOfAds

StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsNumberOfAds(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameter)
gets a data value object for key statistics concerning the number of ads. It should get the following data:
  • the number of ads in the period
  • the number of scheduled ads
  • the number of expired ads
All of these items must collect the value for two periods, plus calculated the growth percentage between these periods

Returns:
a common result value object storing the data

getComparePeriodsNumberOfMembers

StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsNumberOfMembers(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameters)
gets a data value object for key statistics concerning the number of members. It should get the following data:
  • the number of members
  • the number of new members
  • the number of disappeared members
All of these items must collect the value for two periods, plus calculated the growth percentage between these periods

Returns:
a common result value object storing the data

getComparePeriodsNumberOfTransactions

StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsNumberOfTransactions(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameter)
gets a data value object for key statistics concerning the number of Transactions. It should get the following data:
  • the number of transactions for the specific selected payment filter
  • the number of transactions for all transactions
All of these items must collect the value for two periods, plus calculated the growth percentage between these periods

Returns:
a common result value object storing the data

getSinglePeriodGrossProduct

StatisticalResultDTO getSinglePeriodGrossProduct(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameter)
gets a data value object for key statistics concerning the gross product. It should get the following data:
  • the gross product for the specific selected payment filter
  • the gross product for all transactions
All of these items must collect the value for a single period

Returns:
a common result value object storing the data

getSinglePeriodHighestTransactionAmount

StatisticalResultDTO getSinglePeriodHighestTransactionAmount(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameter)

getSinglePeriodMedianAmountPerTransaction

StatisticalResultDTO getSinglePeriodMedianAmountPerTransaction(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameter)
gets a data value object for key statistics concerning the transaction amount. It should get the following data:
  • median transaction amount for the specific selected payment filter
  • the highest transaction amount for the specific selected payment filter
All of these items must collect the value for a single period

Returns:
a common result value object storing the data

getSinglePeriodNumberOfAds

StatisticalResultDTO getSinglePeriodNumberOfAds(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameter)
gets a data value object for key statistics concerning the number of ads. It should get the following data:
  • the number of ads in the period
  • the number of scheduled ads
  • the number of expired ads
All of these items must collect the value for a single period

Returns:
a common result value object storing the data

getSinglePeriodNumberOfMembers

StatisticalResultDTO getSinglePeriodNumberOfMembers(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameters)
gets a data value object for key statistics concerning the number of members. It should get the following data:
  • the number of members
  • the number of new members
  • the number of disappeared members
All of these items must collect the value for a single period

Returns:
a common result value object storing the data

getSinglePeriodNumberOfTransactions

StatisticalResultDTO getSinglePeriodNumberOfTransactions(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameter)
gets a data value object for key statistics concerning the number of Transactions. It should get the following data:
  • the number of transactions for the specific selected payment filter
  • the number of transactions for all transactions
All of these items must collect the value for a single period

Returns:
a common result value object storing the data

getThroughTheTime

StatisticalResultDTO getThroughTheTime(StatisticalKeyDevelopmentsQuery queryParameter)
gets a data value object for key statistics concerning the overview through the years. It should get data with all available years, for each of the previous selected items (so, number of members, gross product, etc).

Returns:
a common result value object storing the data
